title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, it does not take focus.
OB: - Clicking on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
EB: - The first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog should take focus when clicked.
SR:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Click on the first Combo.
3. Observe that the first Combo does not take focus.
